rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows for natural light.
Dining area adjacent to the living room for seamless entertaining.
Modern kitchen with ample workspace and storage, following Vastu principles for energy flow.
Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and closet space.
Additional bedroom following Vastu principles for family comfort.
Additional bedroom with ample natural light and ventilation.
Smaller guest room to accommodate visitors.
Cozy guest room with its own privacy.

openings.description: Main entrance aligned with positive energy flow.
Secondary exit leading to the garden area.

notes.vastu: The design incorporates Vastu principles by orienting main entrance to the south and key living spaces towards favorable directions. The garden is placed at the north to ensure a balance of energy.
notes.building_norms: Complies with local Indian building norms for residential structures on a 50x80 feet plot, ensuring ample space for both living areas and garden.
notes.garden: Large garden area integrated into the design, providing a natural, serene environment.
